title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 21 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 21 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Pelosi rejects Reps Jim Jordan and Jim Banks for Jan 6 committee. McCarthy pulls all GOP picks making the Jan 6 committee solely a Democrat witch hunt. The increasing crime wave across blue cities. Thanks to liberal prosecutors you can steal anything you want, under $950. You can make every day like the old TV show Supermarket Sweep! Clay and Buck talk to callers who describe the shoplifting epidemic, and the helplessness they feel to stop it.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
